ya4.1.2:2.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhudhātu. Cakkhudhātu cakkhu ceva cakkhudhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:5.1: Dibbasotaṁ taṇhāsotaṁ sotaṁ, na sotadhātu. Sotadhātu sotañceva sotadhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:11.1: Kāyadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo, na kāyadhātu. Kāyadhātu kāyo ceva kāyadhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:14.1: Rūpadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ rūpaṁ, na rūpadhātu. Rūpadhātu rūpañceva rūpadhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:18.1: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhadhātu. Gandhadhātu gandho ceva gandhadhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:21.1: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso, na rasadhātu. Rasadhātu raso ceva rasadhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:28.1: Manodhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso mano, na manodhātu. Manodhātu mano ceva manodhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:33.1: Dhammadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammadhātu. Dhammadhātu dhammo ceva dhammadhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:37.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu na cakkhudhātu, cakkhu. Cakkhuñca cakkhudhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva cakkhu na ca cakkhudhātu.
ya4.1.2:40.1: Dibbasotaṁ taṇhāsotaṁ na sotadhātu, sotaṁ. Sotañca sotadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva sotaṁ na ca sotadhātu.
ya4.1.2:47.1: Kāyadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na kāyadhātu, kāyo. Kāyañca kāyadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva kāyo na ca kāyadhātu.
ya4.1.2:50.1: Rūpadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na rūpadhātu, rūpaṁ. Rūpañca rūpadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva rūpaṁ na ca rūpadhātu.
ya4.1.2:51.1: » Na saddo …pe… na gandho na gandhadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:53.1: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho na gandhadhātu, gandho. Gandhañca gandhadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva gandho na ca gandhadhātu.
ya4.1.2:56.1: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso na rasadhātu, raso. Rasañca rasadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva raso na ca rasadhātu.
ya4.1.2:57.1: » Na phoṭṭhabbo …pe… na cakkhuviññāṇaṁ na cakkhuviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:59.1: » Na sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe… na ghānaviññāṇaṁ … na jivhāviññāṇaṁ … na kāyaviññāṇaṁ ….
ya4.1.2:62.1: Manodhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na manodhātu, mano. Manañca manodhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva mano na ca manodhātu.
ya4.1.2:67.1: Dhammadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na dhammadhātu, dhammo. Dhammañca dhammadhātuñca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva dhammo na ca dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:69.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhudhātu. Cakkhudhātu cakkhu ceva cakkhudhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:71.1: Sotadhātu dhātu ceva sotadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na sotadhātu.
ya4.1.2:73.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhudhātu. Cakkhudhātu cakkhu ceva cakkhudhātu ca.
ya4.1.2:75.1: Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:76.1: (Yathā āyatanayamake paṇṇatti evaṁ dhātuyamakepi paṇṇatti. Cakkaṁ bandhitabbaṁ.)
ya4.1.2:80.1: « Na dhātū na ghānadhātu …pe… na dhātū na dhammadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:84.1: Cakkhudhātu dhātu ceva cakkhudhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na cakkhudhātu.
ya4.1.2:86.1: Ghānaṁ …pe… jivhā … kāyo … rūpaṁ … saddo … gandho … raso … phoṭṭhabbo ….
ya4.1.2:89.1: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu dhātu ceva cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe… ghānaviññāṇaṁ … jivhāviññāṇaṁ … kāyaviññāṇaṁ ….
ya4.1.2:92.1: Manodhātu dhātu ceva manodhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na manodhātu.
ya4.1.2:95.1: Manoviññāṇadhātu dhātu ceva manoviññāṇadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na manoviññāṇadhātu.
ya4.1.2:98.1: Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:100.1: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā dhātū na cakkhu, dhātu. Cakkhuñca dhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātū.
ya4.1.2:103.1: Sotaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… ghānaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… jivhaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe….
ya4.1.2:107.1: Rūpaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe… saddaṁ … gandhaṁ … rasaṁ … phoṭṭhabbaṁ … cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe… manoviññāṇaṁ ṭhapetvā …pe….
ya4.1.2:112.1: Sotadhātu dhātu ceva sotadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na sotadhātu.
ya4.1.2:115.1: Dhammadhātu dhātu ceva dhammadhātu ca. Avasesā dhātū na dhammadhātu.
ya4.1.2:118.1: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā dhātū na cakkhudhātu. Cakkhuñca dhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātu.
ya4.1.2:121.1: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā dhātū na cakkhu, dhātu. Cakkhuñca dhātuñca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca dhātu.
ya4.1.2:122.1: « Na dhātū na ghānadhātu …pe… na dhātū na dhammadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:126.1: « Na dhātū na sotadhātu …pe… na dhātū na manoviññāṇadhātūti? Āmantā.
ya4.1.2:128.1: (Yathā āyatanayamakassa paṇṇatti evaṁ dhātuyamakassa paṇṇatti vitthāretabbā.)
